definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to offer a sacrifice to (gods or ancestors)/memorial ceremony/(in classical novels) to recite an incantation to activate a magic weapon/(lit. and fig.) to wield
to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)

sentences.english: And as Peter was beneath in the palace, there cometh one of the maids of the high priest
sentences.chinese: 彼得在下边，院子里，来了大祭司的一个使女。

sentences.english: And the high priest arose, and said unto him, Answerest thou nothing?
sentences.chinese: 大祭司就站起来，对耶稣说，你什么都不回答吗。

sentences.english: And they that stood by said, Revilest thou God's high priest?
sentences.chinese: 站在旁边的人说，你辱骂神的大祭司吗。

sentences.english: He must stay there until the death of the high priest, who was anointed with the holy oil.
sentences.chinese: 他要住在其中，直等到受圣膏的大祭司死了。

sentences.english: These soldiers were lead by the officials from chief priests and scribes of the Sanhedrin .
sentences.chinese: 这些兵丁们是由大祭司和议会中的一些首脑们带领的。

sentences.english: Having brought the apostles, they made them appear before the Sanhedrin to be questioned by the high priest.
sentences.chinese: 带到了，便叫使徒站在公会前，大祭司问他们说。

sentences.english: In Leviticus, He's the high Priest.
Being named by God a high priest of the order of Melchizedek .
sentences.chinese: 并蒙神照著麦基洗德的等次称他为大祭司。

sentences.english: The purity required of the high priest is even greater.
sentences.chinese: 大祭司所需要的纯洁程度就更高了。

sentences.english: Jesus, high priest, son of Phabes.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣，大祭司，菲比斯的儿子。

sentences.english: He is now our High Priest and advocate at the right hand of the most high God.
sentences.chinese: 现在祂作为大祭司坐在至高上帝的右边为我们代求。

sentences.english: So they brought them and set them before the council (Sanhedrin). And the high priest examined them by questioning.
sentences.chinese: 带到了，便叫使徒站在公会前，大祭司问他们说。

sentences.english: 54Then seizing him, they led him away and took him into the house of the high priest.
sentences.chinese: 他们拿住耶稣，把他带到大祭司的宅里。

sentences.english: Jesus, high priest, son of Phineas.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣，大祭司，菲尼亚斯的儿子。

sentences.english: He has even forbidden the high priest to speak with him.
sentences.chinese: 甚至连大祭司也无权与他说话。

sentences.english: The high priest sacrificed the goat on the altar.
sentences.chinese: 大祭司把山羊供奉祭在坛上。

definition: to perform the sacrificial rites at a funeral
Lucifer (Satan's name before his fall in Jewish and Christian mythology)
the Papacy/the Vatican/the Church government/Holy See
